HomePage.title: Ethan Luong
HomePage.subtitle: Affective Computing Intern
HomePage.description: Ethan is an AI engineer who is deeply engrossed in science and new technologies. He may be passionate about data science and AI-related fields (machine learning, natural language processing, computer vision), but he also genuinely enjoys astronomy, psychology and music.

experiencesData.title: Research Intern
experiencesData.description: Harnessing Subspaces of Policies in Reinforcement Learning.

experiencesData.title: Research & Development Intern
experiencesData.description: Metrology Team. ISO10360-12: Data Exploration. Calibration models comparisons for Coordinate Measuring Machines (CMMs). Calibration and neural networks. Study on the ISO10360-8 standard, adapted to articulated CMMs.

experiencesData.title: College Tutor
